title: Model-Based Comparative Analysis of General Pedagogy and Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Educational Theory Knowledge and Mathematics Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Interactive digital classroom environments for professionals, with workplace-integrated practical training

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively explain the historical development of general pedagogy and instructional design.
Learners can analyze major theoretical models of two disciplines and apply them to mathematical problem-solving.
Learners can develop corporate instructional design projects using a model-based approach.
Learners can propose academic integration strategies through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
